COMMON.REPORT_MESSAGE: 我们已经上报此错误，请关闭并重启应用。

CONFIGURE_URL.DESCRIPTION: If you are using a self-hosted Chatwoot installation, input your server URL. Otherwise, use app.chatwoot.com.

LOGIN.TITLE: 登录到您的帐户
LOGIN.DESCRIPTION: You are connected to {{baseUrl}}. Login with your email address and password.

FORGOT_PASSWORD.TITLE: 忘记密码？
FORGOT_PASSWORD.SUB_TITLE: 别担心，我们会支持你的

CONVERSATION.EMPTY: 此群组中没有活动的会话。
CONVERSATION.FILE_SIZE_LIMIT: 文件超过 5MB 附件限制
CONVERSATION.PRIVATE_MSG_INPUT: 此操作仅对代理人可见

NOTIFICATION.EMPTY_MORE_TEXT: 一旦你收到通知，它们将出现在这里。

NOTIFICATION_PREFERENCE.TITLE: 通知设置
NOTIFICATION_PREFERENCE.CONVERSATION_CREATE_PUSH: 创建新会话时发送推送通知
NOTIFICATION_PREFERENCE.CONVERSATION_ASSIGNEE_PUSH: 当会话分配给我时发送推送通知
NOTIFICATION_PREFERENCE.CONVERSATION_ASSIGNED_NEW_MESSAGE_PUSH: 在已分配的会话中创建新消息时发送推送通知
NOTIFICATION_PREFERENCE.CONVERSATION_CREATE_EMAIL: 创建新会话时发送电子邮件通知
NOTIFICATION_PREFERENCE.CONVERSATION_ASSIGNEE_EMAIL: 当会话分配给我时发送电子邮件通知
NOTIFICATION_PREFERENCE.CONVERSATION_ASSIGNED_NEW_MESSAGE_EMAIL: 在已分配的会话中创建新消息时发送电子邮件通知

ERRORS.COMMON_ERROR: 无法连接到服务器，请稍后再试
ERRORS.OfFLINE: 您必须连接到 Wi-Fi 或蜂窝网络才能重新上线。
ERRORS.CANNOT_FETCH: 获取信息时出现错误，请重试
ERRORS.AUTH: 用户名 / 密码不正确。请重试

SERVER_UPGRADE.TITLE: Server upgrade required
SERVER_UPGRADE.WARNING_FOR_AGENT: It seems like you are using unsupported Chatwoot server for your mobile app. Please contact your admin to upgrade your Chatwoot server.
SERVER_UPGRADE.WARNING_FOR_ADMIN: It seems like you are using unsupported Chatwoot server for your mobile app. Upgrading to server version %{minimumVersion} or later is required.
